aka: Obscure night - Wild leaves (The burning ones, the obstinate)
this_title: Nuit obscure - Feuillets sauvages (Les brûlants, les obstinés)
trans_title: 昏夜——野叶（燃烧之物，顽固之人）
Obscure night - Wild leaves (The burning ones, the obstinate)
introduction: Melilla, a Spanish enclave in Morocco, is a land border between the African continent and Europe. A buffer zone where European migration policies, their challenges and their consequences are read and shown. A place towards which converge the migrants of the Maghreb and the Sub-Saharan Africa. They are "those who burn". They have nothing else to lose except wanting to live to the end.
chinese_title: 昏夜——野叶（燃烧之物，顽固之人）
foreign_title: Nuit obscure - Feuillets sauvages (Les brûlants, les obstinés)
